items.sentence: If you'd been a little more patient, you could've succeeded.
If you'd been a little more patient, you would've succeeded.
A group of people gathered around Tom and watched him dance.
Both Tom and Mary tried to stay awake, but Mary fell asleep.
I grew up in a very small town where everyone knew everyone.
I grabbed a golf club, thinking it might make a good weapon.
When I bumped into Tom yesterday, he looked pretty worn out.
Is it true that Tom can't see very well out of his left eye?
I suspected that Tom had never actually ever visited Boston.
I heard that Tom committed suicide, but I didn't believe it.
Tom insisted he didn't have anything to do with the robbery.
You should spend some time in Boston with your grandparents.
I wonder what this place will be like thirty years from now.
I want you to know that I won't be there tomorrow afternoon.
Your eccentricities can make you either charming or tedious.
Your advice has helped me see the light regarding my future.
I thought that we wouldn't get there on time, and we didn't.
Our car broke down and we had to spend the night in a hotel.
If you keep on like this, you'll probably live to reach 120!
I don't feel very well today. That well water is the reason.
